newsletter-signup.required-fields.en: Please fill out all required fields.
newsletter-signup.required-fields.es: Por favor, rellene todos los campos requeridos.

newsletter-signup.captcha-error.en: Captcha failed, please reload and try again
newsletter-signup.captcha-error.es: Captcha fallido, por favor recargue e inténtelo de nuevo.

newsletter-signup.already-subscribed.en: You're already subscribed to this newsletter.
newsletter-signup.already-subscribed.es: Ya estás suscrito a este boletín.

newsletter-signup.subscription-error.en: There was an error. If this problem persists, please email us at community@%{website}.org.
newsletter-signup.subscription-error.es: Hubo un error. Si este problema persiste, por favor envíenos un correo electrónico a community@%{website}.org.
